title: 3 BR, 1 Bath Renovated Garden Unit with Garage Parking
posting_body: Renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bath garden unit (basement level with above-ground windows in each room).
Available unfurnished 10/1/22 for 12 mo lease.
Apartment was fully redone in Fall of 2019.
FLOOR: Above-ground basement level of 3 story building.
PAINT:
Whole apartment will be painted white upon current tenants' move-out, unless new tenant would like to keep any of the colors.
The exceptions are the bathroom, which will likely stay navy blue.
HVAC:
Central heat/AC.
Entry: 6.5' x 7.75 with coat closet.
In pictures, there's a lit up holiday tree.
Listing pics #6 & #7.
Living Room and Kitchen are one huge open room (15' x 29')
but if you were to think of as two spaces it's about 15 x 7 for the Living Room and 14 x 12 for the Kitchen).
Kitchen includes stove, microwave, and dishwasher.
Listing pics #1-#5.
Outside of 3 bedrooms, there is a vestibule separate from the entry (listing pic #8).
Front BR: 10.75' x 8.75' with 2.75' x 6' private hallway and 5.5' x 2' closet.
In pictures, it's the room with built-in bookcases.
Please note the HVAC does not extend to this room.
Listing pics #9-#13.
Middle BR: 11' x 11' with 4.5' x 2' closet.
In pictures, it's the room being used as an office with 2 desks.
Listing pics #14-#16.
Back BR: Irregular shape but 15' long, 7' wide at far end (where bed would likely go) and 10' at near end.
Closet is 5' x 2'.
In pictures, it's the room with black and white wallpaper.
Note that this bedroom is an inner room w/o windows.
Listing pics #17-#19.
Full bath: 16' x 4' with toilet / vanity at near end of bathroom and additional vanity plus shower/tub at far end of bathroom.
Bathroom door is in living room/kitchen (to the left of the black kitchen table in pics).
Listing pics #20-#23.
PARKING: Garage parking spot available behind the building for $100/mo.
Street parking also available for free / no permit.
LAUNDRY:
Coin washers and dryers in the basement, outside of your kitchen door.
REQUIREMENTS / RULES
Proof of income, landlord reference, background/credit check.
$1000 security deposit
Pets considered for additional security deposit.
No smoking of any kind anywhere in the building.
